reviewText: I got this dvd becouse I had  vol. 3 already  I enjoyed this one as well. But it was bite short. It could use more action, I will buy the next one. Hope it is not as much as this was. The price was bite high . It was worth it.

First let me say that series is awesome in everywhere. There is a plot and drama. In this vol. The stepmother finds herself competing for her stepson. When the stepmothers sister arrives to see what her sister and stepson have been doing she feels she needs to help her sister. With his Aunt now in on the action both sisters find themselves competing against one another. The son begins to fall more the aunt than his mother who he started everything with. I don't want to give away to many details so I think I'll leave it at that. Anyway to me this is a good classic H-Series for anyone who loves it. Product arrived quick and easy. No damage and no objections. Also this DVD cover was reversible which was something I've never seen in H-Series before. I thought that was pretty cool. Actually placed the DVD inside a clear case to see both sides.
Taboo Charming Mother is the best and must collection to have great store with very sexy characters. super vol. 4 very entertaining.
THIS WAS JUST DIRTIER, BUT IN A GOOD WAY. VERY EARLY ON IT STARTS OFF BIG AND KEEPS THIS TEMPO, A LITTLE WEAK ON THE ENDING BUT THIS JUST SET THIS UP TO WANT TO WATCH THE NEXT VOL

Great flick. The story line is pretty good and by the end I was hoping there was a #5.

Out of all the taboo charming mother volumes, this one where the sister watches them having sex, and then gives herself up to help her sister. Problem is that she becomes addicted to her nephew and the mom becomes angry at having to give up her son. The sex is great and perhaps for some the attitude of the son is over the top, but watching for sex alone it is a hot show.
